string.name: instruction
string.ul:
1. Minimum 200 points required for withdrawal \n
2. 24-48 hours is required for payment procedure. \n
3. Enter paytm number only.\n
4. Enter number carefully.\n
5. Any dispute regarding payment, please feedback us.

resources.string:
1. Use any of the apps in home page to earn points.
 2. for every 15 min 2 points will be rewarded.
 3. collect as much points you can.
 4. minimum 200 points is required for withdrawal.
